Class ProductControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.server.controllers.AbstractController
io.fusion.air.microservice.adapters.controllers.open.ProductControllerImpl
@CrossOrigin @Configuration @Validated @RestController @RequestMapping("${service.api.path}/product") @RequestScope public class ProductControllerImpl extends AbstractController
Product Controller for the Product Service This is to demonstrate certain concepts in Exception Handling ONLY. Order, Product, Cart all must be part of 3 different Microservices. Only Selected Methods will be secured in this packaged - which are Annotated with
Version:
1.0
Author:
arafkarsh
